meanings.sent1: I dream of visiting Japan one day.
meanings.sent2: Japan is known for its beautiful cherry blossoms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sushi roll go to Japan? For the soy sauce!
meanings.sent4: Her love for Japan was as deep as the ocean surrounding it.
meanings.sent5: The flag of Japan proudly displays a red circle.

meanings.definition: A black lacquer or varnish used in Japan.
meanings.sent1: The table was elegantly coated with Japan.
meanings.sent2: The traditional Japanese tea set gleamed with Japan.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled Japan all over the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The Japan on the antique cabinet gave it a timeless look.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design was enhanced by the layer of Japan.

meanings.definition: To coat with a black lacquer or varnish.
meanings.sent1: She decided to Japan the wooden frame for a glossy finish.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman carefully Japanned the delicate jewelry box.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally Japanned his fingers while painting the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The old chair was beautifully Japanned to restore its shine.
meanings.sent5: The tradition of Japanning has been passed down for generations.
